attributes.action: Nominate HM the Queen for Best Actress in BAFTA/Oscar for her outstanding role in "Happy and Glorious" London 2012 Olympic opening ceremony
attributes.additional_details:
An amazing appearance that shocked the world...

We would like to nominate HM the Queen for a BAFTA / Oscar award for her appearance in "Happy and Glorious" along side with James Bond (Daniel Craig) that were enjoyed by billions of TV audience during the London 2012 Olympic opening ceremony.
